org.trianacode.config

Class Locations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.config.Locations

  • public class Locations
extends java.lang.Object
    Detects/creates the Application directory getApplicationDataDir for storing application specific data. this is rehash of Home, which allows you to find out about the home directory of the Jar (or dist) but also the home directory of triana where all the toolboxes live (getHomeProper). It also allows you to find the application directory and the config file. The new config file is named org.trianacode.properties and is in the app data directory.
